resources.string: When using this app, please use your habitual hand to hold the phone, and touch the phone screen with your thumb finger. Please do activities as fast as you can!
In this activity, some small circles will be presented on screen in sequence. please touch within the field of these circles to destroy them!
In this activity, an icon will be shown to you, please remember this icon and click continue. Then touch the icon you remembered!
In this activity, a sentence will be shown to you, and you need to type the sentence as fast as you could, then click submit!
